thread.title: Packers hold off pass-happy Chargers for 27-20 win

author: senh
title: Packers hold off pass-happy Chargers for 27-20 win
text: BING NEWS: Packers hold off pass-happy Chargers for 27-20 win GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) â€” The Green Bay Packers stopped San Diego on fourth-and-goal from the 3 with 15 seconds left and overcame a career day by Philip Rivers to hold off the Chargers 27-20 on Sunday.
